text: Sir Michael Anthony Epstein CBE, FRS FMedSci (18 May 1921 - 6 February 2024) was a British virologist of Jewish descent.The Palgrave Dictionary of Anglo- Jewish History. W. Rubinstein, Michael A. Jolles. 2001. page 258. He was one of the discoverers of the Epstein-Barr virus. Epstein was Professor of Pathology, 1968-85, and Head of Department, 1968-82 at the University of Bristol. In 1979 he was elected a Fellow of the Royal Society of London and was its Vice-President from 1986 to 1991. In 1989 he was elected a member of the Academia Europaea. He died on 6 February 2024, at the age of 102. == References == == Other websites == * Epstein-Barr virus, Sir Anthony Epstein FRS Category:1921 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Academics of the University of Bristol Category:British virologists Category:English biologists Category:English centenarians Category:English physicians Category:Fellows of the Royal Society Category:Members of Academia Europaea Category:Jewish British scientists Category:Centenarians Category:Pathologists Category:Scientists from London
